thread.title: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Announces "Book Early For Ski Season" Travel Deals
thread.title_full: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Announces "Book Early For Ski Season" Travel Deals - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Wyndham® Extra Holidays Announces "Book Early For Ski Season" Travel Deals
text:
Wyndham Extra Holidays
Save Up to 25% on Ski Resort Destinations
ORLANDO, Fla. , Sept. 24, Wyndham ® Extra Holidays , a subsidiary of Wyndham Vacation Ownership (WVO), the world's largest vacation ownership company and member of the Wyndham Worldwide family of companies (NYSE: WYN), is now offering special travel deals to more than 15 ski resort destinations across the U.S. and Canada during the "Book Early for Ski Season" Sale available at www.ExtraHolidays.com/Ski
Hit the slopes this winter and make plans now to stay at a resort offered by Wyndham ® Extra Holidays . Travelers can stay in spacious condo-style suites most complete with all the comforts of home: fully equipped kitchens, expansive private bedrooms, as well as separate dining and living areas. Take advantage of special deals of up to 25 percent off at popular ski resort destinations across the U.S. and Canada including the resorts featured below.
Park City, Utah - Wyndham Park City
Wyndham Park City is a new ski-in/ski-out resort, where guests can experience skiing, snowboarding and outdoor adventures, as well as modern mountain suites. Comfortably sleeping up to four or eight guests, each one- or two-bedroom suite is furnished with private bedrooms, a queen-sized sleeper sofa, full kitchen, dining area, washer/dryer, and private balcony or patio. Wyndham Park City is conveniently located at the base of Park City Mountain Resort's Canyon Village at the entrance to the Frostwood Gondola and is just 1.5 miles from historic Main Street in Park City .
The Poconos, Pennsylvania - Wyndham Vacation Resorts at Shawnee Village
Located along the scenic Delaware River with premier access to adventurous ski slopes, Wyndham Vacation Resorts Shawnee Village is the ultimate ski getaway, complete with snowboarding and tubing at the Shawnee Mountain Ski Area. After a day on the slopes relax in your two-bedroom family suite with spacious living/dining areas, full kitchen and private bedrooms.
Avon, Colorado - Wyndham Beaver Creek
Wyndham Beaver Creek is a new ski resort located a short distance from the Express Gondola taking you to the area's world-renowned ski slopes of Beaver Creek . This all-suite upscale resort features modern decor with the comforts of home including a full kitchen, living/dining area, private bedrooms, washer/dryer and balcony. Revel in the great outdoors in this winter wonderland, stroll around the quaint alpine village, or stay in and enjoy the resort amenities including the largest indoor hot tub in Colorado , ski valet service, fitness center, ski lockers, an outdoor fire pit, game room, and accommodations that sleep up to 10 guests.
Sevierville, Tennessee - Wyndham Smoky Mountains
Wyndham Smoky Mountains is less than 13 miles from America's number one national park destination, and outdoor adventures such as skiing, snowboarding and tubing abound in the winter. After hitting the slopes there are plenty of on-site resort activities including yoga, crafts, movie night and wine and cheese socials to also take advantage of in this family-friendly resort. Feel at home in roomy one- and two-bedroom family suites with private bedrooms, living/dining areas, kitchens and washer/dryers.
Book now at www.ExtraHolidays.com/Ski or call 800-670-3620 and mention code SNOW. Book by November 24, 2015 . Travel from November 25, 2015 through April 10, 2016 . Two-night minimum stay required. Reservations subject to availability. Reservations not valid over holidays and special events. Cannot be combined with any other offer. All monetary amounts are noted in U.S. Dollars unless otherwise noted. Fla. Seller of Travel Reg. No. ST-35519.
About Wyndham ® Extra Holidays
Wyndham ® Extra Holidays specializes in offering quality vacation accommodations throughout the United States , including Hawaii , the U.S. Virgin Islands , Canada , Mexico , Fiji and Puerto Rico . Wyndham ® Extra Holidays is a specialized provider of rental vacation accommodations and a part of Wyndham Vacation Ownership, which is headquartered in Orlando, Fla. A subsidiary of Wyndham Worldwide , Wyndham Vacation Ownership is the world's largest vacation ownership business, as measured by the number of vacation ownership resorts, individual vacation ownership units and owners of vacation ownership interests.
